member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.WiFi_RS21.Interface
member.summary: The class that will be used to interface with the wifi module. This member will handle everything from initialization to joining networks.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.WiFi_RS21.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The mainboard socket that has the module plugged into it.
